text:
@NYGovCuomo Hey uh Andrew. Were you aware that the word 'Quarantine' means '40 days' in Italian? Why are we throwing out age old wisdom? The ancients were much smarter than we give them credit for. Bodies should be burned also. #CoronaUpdate 
#CoronaVirus
